alert.note: Alert for Holt; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:39PM CDT until September 07 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 739 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bassett, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bassett, Stuart and Newport. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 174 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 254 and 283. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
